login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Access the scoring dashboard and Tech Profiler.

accountSelection.title: Select an account
accountSelection.subtitle: You have multiple accounts associated with this email. Please choose the one you want to use.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your personal information and preferences
profile.roleReadOnly: Role cannot be modified by yourself
profile.imageFormats: Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, GIF. Recommended size: 200x200px. Max 2MB.
profile.themeDesc: The selected theme will be applied immediately
profile.languageDesc: The selected language will be applied after page reload
profile.editorUsersDesc: Manage Editor users associated with your editors
profile.noEditorUsers: No Editor users associated with your editors

admin.title: Administrator Overview
admin.platformManagementDesc: Access all administration modules to manage users, permissions, value lists and audit trails.
admin.fullAccessDesc: View all editors, solutions and data collected on the platform.
admin.quickActionsDesc: Create users, configure permissions and administer data.
admin.viewData: View collected data via Tech Profiler

supervisor.title: Supervisor Dashboard
supervisor.editorsCount: You supervise {{count}} editor in your portfolio.
supervisor.editorsCount_plural: You supervise {{count}} editors in your portfolio.
supervisor.noEditors: No editor assigned to your portfolio.
supervisor.accessProfiler: Access Tech Profiler to collect new data
supervisor.viewHosting: View hosting data for your editors
supervisor.viewScores: View scores and metrics for your editors

entityDirector.title: Entity Director Dashboard
entityDirector.editorInfo: You are associated with the following editor:
entityDirector.noEditor: No editor associated with your account.
entityDirector.useProfiler: Use Tech Profiler to update your data
entityDirector.contactAdmin: No editor associated with your account. Contact an administrator to be assigned to an editor.

editor.title: Editor Dashboard
editor.editorInfo: You are associated with the following editor:
editor.noEditor: No editor associated with your account.
editor.useProfiler: Use Tech Profiler to update your data
editor.contactAdmin: No editor associated with your account. Contact an administrator to be assigned to an editor.

collector.title: Technical MVS Assessment Form

environment.title: Environment Information
environment.dataTypesRequired: At least one data type must be selected

collector.submitDescription: Confirm submission to trigger the first Scoring Snapshot for the solution.
collector.showMore: Show more P2/P3 details (Certifications, Tech Stack)

collectionType.label: Collection Type
collectionType.tooltip: Select the collection type: Snapshot for a quick assessment or DD (Due Diligence) for a complete analysis
collectionType.description: The collection type determines the context and purpose of the assessment.
collectionType.ddModeDescription: DD fields enrich the assessment optionally and can be filled later. They do not block submission. P1 fields remain required for quick submission but are insufficient for completing the Due Diligence.
collectionType.snapshotModeDescription: P1 fields are required for quick submission and scoring snapshot generation.

ddMode.tooltip: Enable this mode to collect all Technical Due Diligence fields. DD fields are optional and can be filled later.
ddMode.description: P1 fields remain required for quick submission. DD fields enrich the assessment without blocking submission.

dd.multiSelectHint: Hold Ctrl (Cmd on Mac) to select multiple options

editorSolution.title: Due Diligence - Editor & Solution
editorSolution.internalItSystemsTooltip: List of the editor's internal IT systems
editorSolution.internalItSystemsPlaceholder: One system per line (e.g., internal CRM, DMS, collaboration tools...)
editorSolution.itSecurityStrategyTooltip: Description of the editor's IT security strategy
editorSolution.itSecurityStrategyPlaceholder: Describe the editor's IT security strategy...

solution.apiRobustnessPlaceholder: Describe API robustness (versioning, rate limiting, documentation...)
solution.apiDocumentationQualityPlaceholder: Describe API documentation quality (OpenAPI, Swagger, examples...)
solution.ipOwnershipClearTooltip: Are intellectual property rights clearly defined?
solution.licensingModelTooltip: Licensing model used (proprietary, open source, mixed...)

environment.networkSecurityMechanismsTooltip: Network security mechanisms deployed (VPN, Firewall, IDS/IPS, WAF...)
environment.disasterRecoveryPlanTooltip: Documented and tested disaster recovery plan

security.title: Due Diligence - Security
security.pentestResultsSummaryTooltip: Summary of latest penetration test results
security.knownSecurityFlawsTooltip: Known security flaws and remediation plan
security.knownSecurityFlawsPlaceholder: List known flaws and their remediation plan...
security.incidentReportingProcessTooltip: Security incident reporting and management process
